txt.en:
'Greeting, [placeholder].

'It is good to see you again; auspicious as well. You see, just as the sun set yesterday, I received a missive from my patron, Keteph. Weeks of silence and then a wordy letter explaining that the aristocracy keeps him busy in Umbar Baharbêl.

'It seems that he needs assistance and he asked that I send you along if I saw you again. He took a liking to you and your thoroughness and knows well of the continued efforts you afforded him.

'You will find him in the Swain's Guild-hall in Umbar Baharbêl.'

'Ah, my friend, you arrive at the very moment of my need. I am pleased that Phâreda informed you of my plight.

'You see, my dishes continue to prove evocative and enticing to the discerning palette of the aristocrats in Umbar Baharbêl. This is good. I am busy and well-engaged, but they grow tired of a taste so quickly it does not long stay on their plates or in their minds. So I must constantly design new dishes for their consumption. This is why I request you visit me.

'I have a notion that requires another discerning individual, like yourself.'
Phâredar received a message from Keteph asking for assistance. You can find Keteph at the Swain's Guild-hall in Umbar Baharbêl.
Make your way to the Swain's Guild-hall in Umbar Baharbêl and speak with Keteph. He requires assistance and thinks you are the person for the job.
